blockers.message: Zenodo query for concept DOI 10.5281/zenodo.16533374 returned 0 hits; v4.3.2 found under concept 10.5281/zenodo.16921951.

remediation: Confirm the correct Concept DOI in Zenodo (is 10.5281/zenodo.16921951 canonical?).
If 10.5281/zenodo.16533374 is intended, ensure the v4.3.2 deposit is under that concept; otherwise update authoritative context to 10.5281/zenodo.16921951.
Once resolved, re-run Apply to write metadata and reports.
